    • deepWaterWaveSpeed

      public static double deepWaterWaveSpeed(double wavelength)
      Deep water wave speed. c = √(gL / 2π) = gT / 2π
      Parameters:
      wavelength - Wavelength (m)
      Returns:
      Phase velocity (m/s)

    • deepWaterWaveSpeedFromPeriod

      public static double deepWaterWaveSpeedFromPeriod(double period)
      Deep water wave speed from period.

    • shallowWaterWaveSpeed

      public static double shallowWaterWaveSpeed(double depth)
      Shallow water wave speed. c = √(gh)
      Parameters:
      depth - Water depth (m)

    • waveNumber

      public static double waveNumber(double period, double depth)
      General dispersion relation (solved iteratively). ω² = gk * tanh(kh)

    • significantWaveHeight

      public static double significantWaveHeight(double windSpeed)
      Significant wave height from wind (simplified). H_s ≈ 0.0246 * U² (Fully developed sea)
      Parameters:
      windSpeed - Wind speed at 10m (m/s)

    • tidalHeight

      public static double tidalHeight(double time, double[] amplitudes, double[] frequencies, double[] phases)
      Tidal constituent prediction. η(t) = Σ A_i * cos(ω_i * t - φ_i)

    • seawaterDensity

      public static double seawaterDensity(double temperature, double salinity)
      Density of seawater from temperature and salinity (UNESCO 1983). Simplified linear approximation.
      Parameters:
      temperature - Temperature (°C)
      salinity - Salinity (PSU)
      Returns:
      Density (kg/m³)

    • soundSpeedSeawater

      public static double soundSpeedSeawater(double temperature, double salinity, double depth)
      Speed of sound in seawater (Mackenzie equation).
      Parameters:
      temperature - Temperature (°C)
      salinity - Salinity (PSU)
      depth - Depth (m)
      Returns:
      Sound speed (m/s)

    • mixedLayerDepth

      public static double mixedLayerDepth(double windStress, double time, double density)
      Mixed layer depth estimate from wind stress. h_ml ≈ (2 * τ * t / ρ)^(1/2) (simplified Kraus-Turner)

    • ekmanTransport

      public static double ekmanTransport(double windStress, double latitude)
      Ekman transport. M_E = τ / (ρ * f) where f = 2Ω sin(φ)
      Parameters:
      windStress - Surface wind stress (N/m²)
      latitude - Latitude (degrees)
      Returns:
      Ekman transport (m²/s)

    • bruntVaisalaFrequency

      public static double bruntVaisalaFrequency(double densityGradient, double meanDensity)
      Brunt-Väisälä (buoyancy) frequency. N² = -(g/ρ) * dρ/dz
